name: Garfelf's Guide to Cross-Platform a Lasagna
name_original: Garfelf's Guide to Cross-Platform a Lasagna
description:
This is the port of the Garfelf's Guide 1 on browser, Mac, Linux and for some reason Windows.

WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAARNIIIIIIIIIIIIIIING!!!!!!! NOTHING FUNKING CHANGED! EVEN ITEMS NAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAMEEEEEEEEEEEES!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Wot do u need 2 do?

In this game your playing the role of some random Joe, I don't know SphereBegginerNoob don't write plots that make sense for these type of games. Anyways you are suppose to collect all three Lasagnas in Garfeilf and Jhon's house that is for some reason like a school. But be careful, because Garfelf and John are going to try and stop you from taking all of their Lasagnas.

WARNING! when you collect all 7 Lasagnas, Turn down you volume or at least turn down you Headphone or just take them off or don't wear any because John gets a little pissed with you and so does Garfelf.

Controls

Copy-pasted from the original BBiEaL itch.io page.

Use the WASD keys to move, and the mouse to turn. Left click to open doors and pick up items, right click to use the currently selected item, and scroll wheel to change the currently selected item. Hold down shift to run (Keep an eye on your stamina bar!), and press space bar to quickly look behind you. Escape can be used to pause.

Credits

  • Micah McGonigal (a.k.a. mystman12) - made the original game
  • Daniilsuperx and YuraSuper2048 - the guys who made Baldi Open Modding Tool, that I used to build the mod lol
  • YOU - played my crap
